column5: Does anyone know of a Chart (free online) that shows what fly to use to catch a particular type of fish?  Thanks for your help!  Regards, Snowball

local fly shop can help you free  it's a vague question, it's not a yes or no answer, this fly only catches that fish...ie: a leech pattern will catch any fish that swims, same with many other patterns  trout can get fussy at times, a local shop will help you understand the local hatches and good fly selection for where you want to fish  where are you located, what river and fish do you want to target?
not a fly fisherman but I have seen chart called match the hatch. Google it and see.
If you register on Wilson's website you can download some free charts.  They look like this:
